Text: RE GTB Payment status Cc Hopefully when everything is done itll be considered quite a bit better than reasonable In addition to the MM cash we should receive next week the following are included in the deal at least another MM cash during January no further EPCSC expenditures except for my staff ie GTB assumes all outstanding purchase commitments followon profitable work consulting for the replacement contractor andor GTB scope rates still to be negotiated a project profit of close to MM about as much as we would have made if the contract were completed but with no further project risk I obviously didnt include these items in the report due to the wide distribution Have a great holiday Jerry Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Saturday December PM To Martin Jerry D Subject Re GTB Payment status This sounds like a reasonable result Rod Hayslett Office Cell Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

GTB Payment status Cc We met with GTB representatives yesterday and today and worked out an agreement in principle for an assignment of our contract to a replacement contractor The commercial terms have been tentatively agreed to pending GTB management approval The other terms and conditions are generally agreed to and the actual wording is in draft form the expectation is to execute the letter agreement by December Also GTB expects to execute their agreement with the replacement contractor by January with the assignment from EPCSC to be effective then GTB agreed to pay their past due invoices by December A payment schedule with conditions and target dates was agreed to for the balance of payments All are targeted to be paid during January Enron Pipeline Construction Services Company EPCSC received no payments since last weeks report The total paid to date is K EPCSCs portion remains at K Nine EPCSC invoices remain past due and the following is a summary of the GTB payments in process either debit noticed or invoiced along with their forecasted due dates Due Date Amount Jan K Invoice Yacuses Construction Progress November Jan K Invoice Rio Grande delivery to jobsite Jan K Invoice Yacuses Solar Engineering November Jan K Invoice Chiquitos Solar Engineering November Jan K Invoice Izozog Solar Engineering November Jan K Invoice Robore Solar Engineering November TOTAL K Past Due Amount Nov K Invoice Chiquitos Drawing Package Issued for Approval Nov K Invoice Yacuses Delivery of Major Equipment Dec K Invoice Yacuses Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Chiquitos Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Izozog Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Robore Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Yacuses Construction Progress October Dec K Invoice Izozog NTP Equipment Specification Dec K Invoice Robore NTP Equipment Specification TOTAL K If anyone has questions about the status or the agreement please call me any time at Thanks Jerry

GTB Payment Status Cc Enron and IPE received payments totaling K since last weeks report and the total paid to date is K Enrons portion is K GTB is current on all invoices and the following is a summary of the GTB payments in process either debit noticed or invoiced along with their forecasted due dates Due Date Amount Nov K Invoice Chiquitos Drawing Package Issued for Approval Nov K Invoice Yacuses Delivery of Major Equipment Nov K Invoice Yacuses Construction Progress Sept Dec K Invoice Yacuses Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Chiquitos Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Izozog Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Robore Solar Engineering October Dec K Invoice Yacuses Construction Progress October Dec K Invoice Izozog NTP Equipment Specification Dec K Invoice Robore NTP Equipment Specification Dec K Debit Notice Chiquitos Drawing Package Issued for Construction Dec K Debit Notice Rio Grande Delivery to Job Site Jan K Debit Notice Izozog Submittal of PID Jan K Debit Notice Robore Submittal of PID Jan K Debit Notice Izozog Major Equipment PO Jan K Debit Notice Robore Major Equipment PO TOTAL K Thanks Jerry

FW Red Rock BriefingOriginal Appointment From Alexander Betty On Behalf Of Martin Jerry D Sent Tuesday January PM To Martin Jerry D Kilmer III Robert Eisenstein Arnold L Veatch Stephen Matthews Ron Rapp Bill Allen Kelly Lokey Teb Subject Red Rock Briefing When Wednesday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ACC
